SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Difficulty
Represents the difficulty level of a recipe based off of the number of steps in the recipe
Ingredient
Represents a single ingredient in a recipe Stores the ingredient's name, amount, and unit
IngredientTest
The test class IngredientTest.
Rating
Represents a rating for a recipe that includes a star score and a comment
RatingTest
The test class RatingTest.
Recipe
An abstract class representing a Recipe It allows: - Adding/removing recipes - Scaling ingredients - Calculating the difficulty and highest rating - Printing the recipe details Specific recipes(hot/cold)
RecipeAdder
Automatically creates a recipe and adds it to a RecipeBook.
RecipeBook
Represents a recipe book containing multiple recipes
RecipeBookTest
This class tests the RecipeBook class and its main methods
RecipeCold
Represents a cold recipe that needs chilling before eating Extends the Recipe class and adds chill time in minutes
RecipeColdTest
The test class RecipeColdTest.
RecipeHot
Represents a hot recipe that requires cooking Inherits from the abstract Recipe class
RecipeHotTest
Unit tests for the RecipeHot class
RecipesTest
This class is used to test the Recipe class
Step
Represents a single step in a recipe Each step has a number(its order in the recipe) and a description of what to do
Tag
List of different dietary or nutritional tags that a recipe can have
Unit
List of units that are available to use for ingredients
